div.div:
From Mrs. Carlson: Students should look to Google Classroom for review materials, information and announcements. Mrs. Carlson will also be using the Remind app to communicate with parents and students.
1st Block: Google Classroom Code=xjqiwhz
Remind: Text @s2hist1 to the number 81010
2nd Block: Google Classroom Code gfcxz35
Remind: Text @s2hist2 to the number 81010
3rd Block: Google Classroom Code 4qibrla
Remind: Text @s2hist3 to the number 81010
From Mrs. Rowe: Students should check Google Classroom. All of my students have joined my classes and can access what they need there. Packets are also available at GHS if they need/want a paper copy. If parents would like to receive notification from Mrs. Rowe about their students World History assignments, they can sign up for Remind by sending the message @ek3e3h to #81010.
From Mrs. Mathews: Students should visit Google Classroom and Plato for 4th quarter in psychology B-2 and B-4.
From Mr. Cecere: Students should accept the invitation or use the following codes to join Google Classroom for assignments, materials, and announcements.
Mr. Cecere's 1st Period Dual U.S. History: twch4fb
Mr. Cecere's 3rd and 4th Period U.S. History: Oa4njo5
Students should also visit Groups in MyVR Spot which is accessible on the GCPS and GHS websites. The group to access videos is Mr. Cecere U.S. History GHS
From Mr. LaRoque: Students have been invited to join Google Classroom for information, materials, and announcements.

div.div:
From Mrs. K. Johnson: Students can find information and other resources in Google Classroom.
From Mrs. Jemmison: Students should continue to check their email and Unified Classroom (including Class Pages) for announcements. Most instruction will be online through Plato for the 4th quarter; students who are unable to use Plato should contact me or the school.
-Link to Geometry 4th quarter instructions
-Link to Capstone 4th quarter instructions.
-Link to A2T 4th quarter instructions.
-Link for A2T to other (not required) important topics.
From Mrs. Mecca: Students should log-in to Schoology for assignments, announcements and materials.
From Mrs. Foster: Students can visit our Google Classroom to find review materials and new lessons. Please feel free to email me if there are any questions or concerns.
From Mrs. Ralph: All students who are able should go to the Pages section of Unified Classroom and be sure to check your email.
From Mrs. Stanford: Students should visit Google Classroom for materials, assignments, and announcements.
Review packets for 3/30-4/17 are linked in the buttons below. Click the button to download/view/print the packet.

div.div: From Mrs. Stokes: Students and parents are encouraged to email Mrs. Stokes if she is your counselor to check in and ask questions. Her email address can be found on the Directory and School Counseling pages.

div.span: Students taking fine arts classes should visit the

div.div: From Mr. Alexander: Students should visit Google Classroom for information, materials, and assignments. LINKED HERE is a letter from Mr. A to all of his students.

From Ms. Neff: Students should consult Google Classroom for information and resources.The code to join the class is 5ntttja. Parents are also encouraged to join. You can also sign up for the Remind app by sending @fr2b1 to 81010. CLICK HERE to download/view/print the French 2 packet for 3/30-4/17.
From Mr. Williams: Students should consult Google Classroom for materials. Communication to students is taking place through Remind App. To join Remind, text @f77kg8k for Spanish 3, @kgac2kk for Spanish IV or @69b27k for the AP review session to the number 81010. Parents are also encouraged to sign up. No download is necessary. Please email Mr. Williams at [emailprotected] with any questions, problems or concerns.
From Mrs. Coleman: Students should visit Google Classroom for daily activity postings. If you dont have regular internet access, please pick up a packet as designated by the school. You can also sign up for the Remind App (Spanish 1) by texting @bh3kce to 81010 or (Spanish 2) by texting @kba84ck to 81010. You can use this to contact me with questions.
From Ms. Falkenberg:All students should pick up a review packet from the main office. The Remind app will be the main communication tool (instructions included on the cover letter).
From Mr. Ashworth: Students in French 1 can access review materials on google classroom by using code u3wgdhg and signing in. Students in French 3 1st block can access review materials on google classroom by using code 5b7qjpp and signing in. Students in French 3 2nd block can access review materials on google classroom by using code s42tdnf and signing in. All students can access their current vocabulary by accessing quizlet through quizlet.com/ashworths. There are activities to use on the site to practice the vocabulary.
From Mrs. Ramos: All learning material going forward will be delivered through Google Classroom. Digital office hours are 7am-11am Mon-Fri. Completed, hard copy packets can be submitted via email with attached images. Please note the packet number in the subject line. Please submit packets by the following dates: Packet #1 by Sunday, April 5th and Packet #2 by Wednesday, April 15th.
Review packets for 3/30-4/17 are linked in the buttons below. Click the button to download/view/print the packet.

div.div:
From Mrs. Hypes: Please see Google Classroom for information. Look specifically for an assignment called "Work for March 16-27".
From Ms. Wright: Cosmetology students should visit Google Classroom to get login and class codes for Cengage/MindTap Virtual Classrooms. You have also received emails with this information including links and access key codes. Please check your school emails.
From Mrs. Outten: Please check the stream in Google Classroom for information about your 4th quarter assignments and due dates. Contact me if you have any questions or concerns.We will meet on Zoom once or twice a week to make sure everyone is keeping up with their assignments and for me to be able to answer any questions or provide any help you may need.
From Mrs. Johnson: Health and Medical Sciences packets are ready for pick up for all classes.
From Chef Winchester: Students are now set up in Plato and should have received a message about logging in.

From Mrs. Ayler-Milby: Students should consult Google Classroom for information and assignments. SENIORS: Should concentrate on SIRS.
From Ms. Sharp: Students should visit Google Classroom for information, materials, and announcements.
From Mrs. Burns: Students should visit Google Classroom for information, materials, and announcements.
From Mrs. Soueidan: Students should visit Google Classroom for information, materials and announcements.
From Ms. Head: Students should visit Google Classroom for information, materials, and announcements.
From Mr. Wall: LINKED HERE is a PDF of focused exercises and information for students to use during this time.
From Mrs. Hudgins: Students should visit Google Classroom for information, materials, and announcements.
From Mrs. Williams: Students should visit Google Classroom for information, materials, and announcements.

From Mrs. Haydon: All students have been invited to join a Google Classroom. Please use your Google account and accept the invitation.
From Mrs. Price: All students have been invited to join a Google Classroom. Please use your Google account and accept hte invitation. The same material that is posted there is also available in the pick-up packet.
From Mrs. Scott: Students should visit Google Classroom for information, materials, and announcements. LINKED HERE is the same information found in the Classroom.
From Mrs. Cain: Students have all been invited to a Google Classroom or should have received their packet of review materials.
From Mrs. Sandifer: Students should visit Google Classroom for materials, assignments and announcements.
From Ms. Nagle: Students should visit Google Classroom for materials, assignments, and announcements.
From Coach Scalf: Students should visit Google Classroom for materials, assignments, and announcements.
From Mrs. Marchant-Jones: Students should visit Google Classroom for materials, assignments, and announcements. If students cannot access Classroom, then they should reach out to Mrs. Marchant-Jones via email as soon as possible.
From Mrs. Smoker: All students should check Google Classroom for announcements and reminders of work to complete in PLATO. In addition to email, students and parents can use the Remind app to contact me directly. The code for Chem 1 is @mssmoker. The code for AP Chem is @onlineapc.
Review packets for 3/30-4/17 are linked in the buttons below. Click the button to download/view/print the packet.

div.div:
From Mrs. Winter & Coach Nichols:
-All students have been added to Google Classroom and students should check their email to join. There is also an Instagram page where we are posting workouts. That can be found at ghs_strength. Any student/athlete can follow.
-There is also a Google Classroom for Adpated PE. An email has been sent for them to join. Parents and students can email me at [emailprotected]
From Ms. Newell: Please visit Google Classroom from materials, assignments, and announcements.
From Mrs. Webb: All students currently enrolled under Mrs. Webb, during second semester, need to complete all assignments in Plato for 4th quarter. If you were in Health first semester (Hybrid 1A & 3A), you still need to complete the entire curriculum on Plato for 4th quarter. It encompasses both Health & Physical Education information. Fourth quarter grades will reflect completion of these assignments. If you have questions, please email me.
